docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Delta Warriors is a 3D fighter with Open-World and Gacha elements based on Deltarune. It was developed by Idyll Works and is hosted on Roblox.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
New to Delta Warriors? These articles will help you get started with the basics:

  • Introduction, the Survey.
  • What are Soul Traits and how to acquire them?
  • How to gain EXP to unlock techniques and upgrades?
  • How to acquire and use Equipment?

docs.title: Community Links
docs.text:
Important links are on every page!

You can find important links in the footer of every page, including the Roblox game page, Discord server, and the official Deltarune website. Delta Warriors is a fan-made project and is not affiliated with Deltarune or Toby Fox.

Join our community to stay updated and connect with other players:

  • Delta Warriors' official Discord server
  • Delta Warriors on Roblox
  • Idyll Works Roblox community

This wiki is open-source. Found an error? Let us know on Discord! debugString04

docs.title: CONNECTION
docs.text: Game Mechanics

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
The Survey Program (or more formally, the Introduction) serves as the game’s opening sequence and determines your first Soul Trait. It is mandatory and will only occur once per account, regardless of your actions or progress.

Players are asked a series of bizarre, surreal questions. Their responses shape their initial Soul Trait, chosen from six possible traits:

docs.title: Early Access Note
docs.text:
Delta Warriors is currently in early access. Only two Soul Traits can currently be obtained from the Survey:

  • Bravery
  • Integrity

The remaining traits will temporarily transform into one of the available ones:

Unavailable Soul Trait Replacement Justice Integrity Kindness Integrity Patience Integrity Perseverance Bravery

Expand to see dialogue
  • ARE YOU THERE?
  • ARE WE CONNECTED?
  • EXCELLENT.
  • TRULY EXCELLENT.
  • NOW.
  • WE MAY BEGIN.
  • WHAT COLOUR DOES IT SEE THE SKY AS?
  • WHAT IS ITS FAVOURITE FOOD?
  • ITS FAVOURITE BLOOD TYPE?
  • HOW DOES IT REACT TO MUSIC?
  • WHICH PATH DOES IT FOLLOW?
  • INTERESTING.
  • VERY INTERESTING.
  • WHAT ABOUT YOU "player-name?"
  • SELECT THE SOUL THAT YOU PREFER.
  • [If the chosen soul matches the test result]
    • AN INTERESTING COINCIDENCE.
    • VERY, VERY INTERESTING.
  • [If the chosen soul matches the test result and answers favour one soul]
    • HOW VERY AMUSING.
    • ARE YOU TAUNTING ME?
  • HAVE YOU ANSWERED HONESTLY?
  • [If you decline]
    • FEED YOUR CURIOSITY.
    • (You are sent back to the first question.)
  • DO YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THE POSSIBILITY OF PAIN AND SEIZURE?
  • EXCELLENT.
  • TRULY EXCELLENT.
  • "player-name."
  • THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME.
  • YOUR "WILL."
  • YOUR "chosen-soul."
  • WILL NOW BE
  • DISCARDED.
  • NO ONE CAN CHOOSE WHO THEY ARE IN THIS WORLD.
  • You are filled with soul-name.

docs.title: Trivia
docs.text:
• Though some of these questions may seem like utter nonsense, each answer is tied to specific Soul Traits. Some connections are… more absurd than others.
  • Unlike in the original, Kris1 does not intervene to discard your vessel — because there is no vessel.
  • You’re not meant to know how it all works. But someone probably does. :3c

Last updated: v1.0.0

  1. This is a headcanon held by the creator of Delta Warriors. Kris' role in the original remains unconfirmed. ↩

docs.title: Rarities
docs.text: Game Mechanics

docs.title: Soul Traits
docs.text: Game Mechanics Soul Traits

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
Soul Traits are a core mechanic, representing the very culmination of your being. They determine your available techniques and equipment, while also influencing your growth and interaction with the world and its inhabitants.

Souls manifest in one of four distinct forms:

Each Soul is also assigned a two-faced rarity: a tier — C, UC, R, SR, SSR, LR, XLR, and EX — and a rank (ranging from 2 to Ace) within one of four archetypes, each represented by a suit: ♠ ♥ ♦ ♣

A Soul’s rarity and rank determines its inherent versatility and potential, though no Soul is ever strictly inferior or inherently supreme.

More detailed breakdown of the rarity system

docs.title: Acquisition
docs.text:
There are two ways to obtain a Soul Trait, each with its own caveats:

  • The Survey Program (also known as the Introduction) is the very first method you'll encounter. It acts as the game's opening, where players are presented with a series of questions. More detailed breakdown of the Survey Program

  • The second method is through Dark Fountains, which serve as the game’s gacha system. True to the genre, players can pull Souls randomly from a "banner" — or in this case, a Fountain. More detailed breakdown of Dark Fountains

docs.title: Roster
docs.text:
This list contains Soul Traits that are fully implemented into the game.

Rarity Soul Trait Original User Appearance UC 8♣ Bravery Third fallen human UC 5♣ Integrity Fourth fallen human R J♠ Mischief Lancer R 7♥ Reverence Ralsei SR 6♠ Ambivalence Kris (Dark World) SSR Q♣ Fervour Susie (Dark World)

Last updated: v1.0.0
